summary: For lazy people or people who don't want to level up stamina every time they level up.
descriptionHtml:
This mod does simply increased your carry weight to 29029 so if you're carrying quest items with mod items so you shouldn't have any problem getting over-encumbered

Compatible with everything: Since it uses the code from the vanilla game.

Installation in .RAR File

Incompatible with "GMAN - Give Me Achievements NOW and Items for A Successful Start" mod by me, specificallyÂ the Player Changes version does overwrite the same code since it modifies it too,
If you want to use the 2 mods together, use the No Player Changes version
author: DodyXR1555
